name: devnovate-blog-platform
description: Modern MERN stack blogging platform with advanced features

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:client && npm run lint:fix:server
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-all && npm run build

author: Devnovate Team
